footer.aboutText: Since 2007, onecompany has been shaping the culture of premium tuning: over 12,000 satisfied customers, hundreds of custom projects, and uncompromising post-installation support.

about.intro: Since 2007, we have been shaping the culture of premium tuning: 12,000+ satisfied customers, hundreds of individual projects, and uncompromising support after installation.

brandsPage.title: Brands
brandsPage.logoDisclaimer: Logos shown where available – others use a placeholder until assets are added.

landing.welcomeText: OneCompany has been active since 2007 as a distributor for premium aftermarket brands in the automotive & motorcycle industry. We've built strong relationships with trusted partners across Ukraine and beyond.
landing.expertSelectionDesc: Our team of specialists provides personalized consultations to select the perfect performance parts for your specific vehicle and requirements.
landing.globalNetworkDesc: Access to certified installation partners worldwide, ensuring professional fitment and optimal performance of all components.
landing.premiumSupportDesc: Comprehensive after-sales support and technical assistance to ensure complete satisfaction with every purchase.
landing.brandsDesc: We represent over 200+ world-leading brands in performance automotive and motorcycle parts
landing.wheelsBrakesDesc: Forged wheels, brake kits, calipers, rotors
landing.carbonFiberDesc: Aero parts, interior trim, performance upgrades
landing.interiorDesc: Seats, steering wheels, roll cages, gauges
landing.upgradeDesc: Contact our specialists for personalized recommendations and expert advice on premium performance parts

info.selectionDesc: Our team of specialists can select parts individually to meet your specific needs.
info.expertHelpDesc: We provide expert consultation to help you make the best choice.
info.partnerNetworkDesc: We have a network of partners for installations of any complexity, all over the world.
info.worldwideDeliveryDesc: We offer fast and reliable delivery to anywhere in the world.
